## Description {#details}

This is a helper class used for <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a90c017a4d672e046b7e98f67edf082ec">format&#95;hex()</a> and <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0891783364de54e1128f37fdbc01e8b1">format&#95;decimal()</a>.
